content.rendered:
Payment Options

Tropea Chiropractic Inc believes in the value of wellness care for you and your family and have maintained a pricing structure that allows care for all budgets. We do not accept Medicare and any HMO insurances. We do accept out-of-network PPO only. The office will do a no-charge courtesy insurance verification. For patients who have little or no chiropractic insurance coverage, flexible payment programs can be arranged. To learn more about our payment options for chiropractic and wellness care, you can call our office directly.
